title: The Law of Success by Napoleon Hill
description:
The Law of Success
by Napoleon Hill   
Read by Fred Stella   
Listen to an audio

Unabridged - 21 Compact Discs / 26 hours.
978-1-4558-1966-9
Audiobook Published by Brilliance Audio

List Price: $29.99

Quantity:    

BUSINESS:  Napoleon Hill is considered the forefather of the modern personal development movement and his motivational classic, Think and Grow Rich â€” the twentieth bestselling book of all-time â€” has inspired millions with its words and thoughts on discovering success and abundance within oneself. But, Think and Grow Rich was but a condensation of his true master work, The Law of Success.

Twenty years of research and writing after his first interview with Andrew Carnegie. Twenty years spent interviewing the most famous and successful men of his time, studying their habits, analyzing their methods and unlocking their secrets to success. First published in 1928 as an eight-book series, The Law of Success represents Hillâ€™s complete philosophy of success and mind-power method â€” the original master key to personal achievement.

In this audiobook you will hear Hillâ€™s complete explanation of his method, his philosophy, and his science of personal achievement â€” unabridged and unadorned with modern updates. Learn the:

* The Principles of Self-Mastery â€” the master mind, definite aim, self-confidence and the habit of saving
* The Principles of Personal Power â€” initiative & leadership, imagination, enthusiasm and self-control
* The Principles of Self Creation â€” doing more than expected, a pleasing personality, accurate thinking and concentration
* The Principles of Integrity â€” cooperation, profiting by failure, tolerance, the golden rule and universal law
